pageProps.title: We know more compared to what we understood

children.value: Information is only acquired when you try to make sense of it

, we just know more compared to what we understood.

.
The amount of things is too great that deserve our limited attention.
We can still make sense of the things we know since
We are more associative than structured

.
Our associative thinking along with our intuition is enough to make sense of things, we can always know the details later.

.
